english.segment1: It has gotten to my head. Permeates the path I tread. But I tread, I'm moving on. In a new happy song. I can sig about the night. How my tunnel without light. Led me to the other side. Where the sky is blue
english.segment2: It's all I can do to not let them ruin me. I will not let them ruin me. I will not let them ruin me again
english.segment3: There is fire inside the tree. Flames of knowing kissing me. I have waited long to see a sign from you
english.segment4: It's all I can do to not let them ruin me. I will not let them ruin me. I will not let them ruin me again
